title:
Explore Structural Engineer Cost & Turnaround
Estimates For Our Services In California

acf.after_table_note: * The final quote and turnaround time may vary based on specific details of your project, such as square footage, quantity, complexity, etc.
acf.banner_content:
Welcome to ProStruct Engineering, where we believe in providing exceptional structural engineering services with full transparency. We're committed to giving you peace of mind and a stress-free experience throughout your home-building process.

To guide you, we have compiled a comprehensive list of our services along with their corresponding costs.
acf.fees_section_content: We understand the importance of clear price estimates for informed decision-making. Discover our structural engineer cost estimate for your project type based on our extensive experience, and trust us to assist you in achieving your project goals.
acf.fees_table:
Project Types W/ Turnaround Time* Services Offered Professional Fee Starting at*
Virtual Consultation (1 Week) 1 Week Project Specific Technical Advice By A Licensed Engineer Over FaceTime/Zoom. $200
On-site Visit (1 Week) 1 Week In-person Visit: Ideal For Inspecting Structural Damage, Cracks, And Providing Recommendations. $400
As-built Drawings (1 Week) 1 Week On-Site Visit To Capture Structural Measurements - As-builts are required for Addition/Remodel, Attached & Embedded ADUs, and Load-Bearing Wall Projects $800
Load-bearing Wall Removal (1-2 Weeks) 1-2 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $1500
Retaining Wall (1-2 Weeks) 1-2 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $1500
Deck/Patio/Porch/Pergola (1-2 Weeks) 1-2 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $1500
Foundation Design (1-2 Weeks) 1-2 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $1500
ADU (2-3 Weeks) 2-3 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $1800
Addition/Remodel (2-3 Weeks) 2-3 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $2000
New Custom Home (2-3 Weeks) 2-3 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) $2500
Other Project Types (1-3 Weeks) 1-3 Weeks Structural Engineering (Stamped Calculations & Drawings) TBD
acf.section_content_get_started: CONTACT US TODAY
